original_text: At destruction and famine thou shalt laugh: neither shalt thou be afraid of the beasts of the earth.
korean_text: 너는 멸망과 기근을 비웃으며 들짐승을 두려워하지 말라

sentences.original_text: At destruction and famine thou shalt laugh
sentences.korean_translation: 파멸과 기근 속에서 너는 웃을 것이며

sentences.original_text: neither shalt thou be afraid of the beasts of the earth
